description: Students expand their skills by continuing to listen, speak, read, and write on such topics as the concept of time, leisure activities, and culinary traditions in North American and Hispanic cultures. Additional work is done in the World Languages Center. Prerequisite: Spanish 111 or placement. Offered each semester.
name: Beginning Spanish II
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of Spanish placement test or preceding course.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Spanish 111 or placement. Offered each semester.
